question: Which scholars won prizes in Physics and were affiliated with University of Cambridge?
cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize), (s)-[:AFFILIATED_WITH]->(i:Institution) WHERE lower(p.category) CONTAINS 'physics' AND lower(i.name) CONTAINS 'university of cambridge' RETURN s.knownName AS knownName, p.awardYear AS awardYear ORDER BY awardYear
description: Multi-hop query with category and affiliation filters

question: How many Chemistry laureates were born in Paris?
cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize), (s)-[:BORN_IN]->(c:City) WHERE lower(p.category) CONTAINS 'chemistry' AND lower(c.name) CONTAINS 'paris' RETURN count(DISTINCT s)
description: Count aggregation with category and location filters

question: List the institutions for Medicine laureates born in Germany.
cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize), (s)-[:BORN_IN]->(c:City), (s)-[:AFFILIATED_WITH]->(i:Institution) WHERE lower(p.category) CONTAINS 'medicine' AND lower(c.name) CONTAINS 'germany' RETURN DISTINCT i.name ORDER BY i.name

question: Who won the Economics prize in 2010?
cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE p.awardYear = 2010 AND lower(p.category) CONTAINS 'economics' RETURN s.knownName ORDER BY s.knownName
description: Simple filter by year and category

question: Which laureates were affiliated with institutions in Cambridge?
cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:AFFILIATED_WITH]->(i:Institution) WHERE lower(i.name) CONTAINS 'cambridge' RETURN DISTINCT s.knownName ORDER BY s.knownName

question: Find Physics laureates born in the United States and affiliated with MIT.
cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize), (s)-[:AFFILIATED_WITH]->(i:Institution), (s)-[:BORN_IN]->(c:City)-[:IS_CITY_IN]->(co:Country) WHERE lower(p.category) CONTAINS 'physics' AND lower(i.name) CONTAINS 'mit' AND lower(co.name) CONTAINS 'united states' RETURN s.knownName, p.awardYear ORDER BY p.awardYear

question: How many laureates affiliated with Harvard University won prizes in Literature?
cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize), (s)-[:AFFILIATED_WITH]->(i:Institution) WHERE lower(i.name) CONTAINS 'harvard university' AND lower(p.category) CONTAINS 'literature' RETURN count(DISTINCT s)
description: Count with affiliation and category filter

question: List all laureates who won prizes after 2000 and were born in London.
cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize), (s)-[:BORN_IN]->(c:City) WHERE p.awardYear > 2000 AND lower(c.name) CONTAINS 'london' RETURN DISTINCT s.knownName, p.awardYear ORDER BY p.awardYear

question: Which scholars won prizes in Peace and were affiliated with institutions in Oslo?
cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize), (s)-[:AFFILIATED_WITH]->(i:Institution) WHERE lower(p.category) CONTAINS 'peace' AND lower(i.name) CONTAINS 'oslo' RETURN s.knownName AS knownName, p.awardYear AS awardYear ORDER BY awardYear

question: What are the names of scholars affiliated with Stanford University?
cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:AFFILIATED_WITH]->(i:Institution) WHERE lower(i.name) CONTAINS 'stanford university' RETURN DISTINCT s.knownName ORDER BY s.knownName

question: How many scholars won prizes before 1950?
cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE p.awardYear < 1950 RETURN count(DISTINCT s)

question: List all Chemistry laureates who were born in Europe.
cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize), (s)-[:BORN_IN]->(c:City)-[:IS_CITY_IN]->(co:Country)-[:IS_COUNTRY_IN]->(cont:Continent) WHERE lower(p.category) CONTAINS 'chemistry' AND lower(cont.name) CONTAINS 'europe' RETURN DISTINCT s.knownName ORDER BY s.knownName

question: Which scholars won multiple prizes?
cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WITH s, count(p) AS prizeCount WHERE prizeCount > 1 RETURN s.knownName, prizeCount ORDER BY prizeCount DESC
description: Aggregation with filter on aggregated value

question: Find all laureates affiliated with institutions in California.
cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:AFFILIATED_WITH]->(i:Institution) WHERE lower(i.name) CONTAINS 'california' RETURN DISTINCT s.knownName ORDER BY s.knownName

question: Which Physics laureates were affiliated with University of Chicago?
cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize), (s)-[:AFFILIATED_WITH]->(i:Institution) WHERE lower(p.category) CONTAINS 'physics' AND lower(i.name) CONTAINS 'university of chicago' RETURN s.knownName, p.awardYear ORDER BY p.awardYear

question: How many female scholars won Nobel prizes?
cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE lower(s.gender) = 'female' RETURN count(DISTINCT s)

question: List all scholars born in Asia who won prizes.
cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize), (s)-[:BORN_IN]->(c:City)-[:IS_CITY_IN]->(co:Country)-[:IS_COUNTRY_IN]->(cont:Continent) WHERE lower(cont.name) CONTAINS 'asia' RETURN DISTINCT s.knownName ORDER BY s.knownName

question: Which laureates won prizes in 2019?
cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE p.awardYear = 2019 RETURN s.knownName, p.category ORDER BY p.category

question: Find scholars affiliated with MIT who won prizes in Economics.
cypher: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize), (s)-[:AFFILIATED_WITH]->(i:Institution) WHERE lower(p.category) CONTAINS 'economics' AND lower(i.name) CONTAINS 'mit' RETURN s.knownName, p.awardYear ORDER BY p.awardYear

question: What institutions are located in Cambridge?
cypher: MATCH (i:Institution) WHERE lower(i.name) CONTAINS 'cambridge' RETURN DISTINCT i.name ORDER BY i.name
